comment: found the 0.042pJ/bit number from PAM-4 paper
column7: which is a transmitter used to make the Albireo MRR. Albireo calculates energies across 4 bits at a time
column8: so dividing 3.1mW / 4 for the MRR yields MRR energies per bit. area is 20 * 20 um = 400 um^2.

comment: energy in pJ; (20x20) area in um^2
